website_summaries.verdict: Even if you aren't a fan of the Tolkien universe, Shadow of Mordor is a great-looking and ultra-satisfying action game filled with remarkable villains and countless memorable moments.
pros: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor is great action game with brilliant enemy design and a smart "nemesis system" that dynamically impacts your play
There's tons to explore and do outside of the main campaign, sure to provide most players with over 20 hours of gameplay
cons: Its controls can occasionally feel wonky and a few camera issues pop up from time to time

customer_reviews.title: Almost.
customer_reviews.text: I am torn. I wanted this game to be better. The layout felt exactly like Assassins creed but in middle earth, which I KIND of liked. The bugs though, the extreme lag makes this game almost unplayable. Seemed to only really be a serious problem with huge fights, like the processor couldn't keep up. That was terrible and really held me back from being immersed. Very short game and the final boss was lame. I am a fan of LOTR and just wished they would've spent just a bit more time getting this right.
customer_reviews.author: James Gop

customer_reviews.title: - 20 stars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im updating my review on this game. I love the game and the story lines are great but after getting 55% of the game finished it just freezes and is unplayable! Im not the only one it seems either as many have contacted the designers of the game and it was never finished or fixed. I will never purchase a game from the maker again because they just went on with the ps4 version and left us out in the cold with a broken game.....Thanks SO Much for customer service!!!! If I could give it a minus rating I would so don't waste your money or time....BOOOOOO
customer_reviews.author: Doug Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Played this game for a few hours before being sucked into the vortex of other games like Destiny
customer_reviews.text: Played this game for a few hours before being sucked into the vortex of other games like Destiny, Dark Souls 2 and Borderlands 2 so never really felt that into this game emotionally. To be fair, if I had played more, it may have been enjoyable. The setting of Mordor that you begin in, is a bleak and desert area filled with enemy Orcs, and it feels a bit more assassins creed than dark souls, I fought one of the Nemesis orcs but it was inconclusive, so he ran away.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Laskey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The PS3 version of this game is absolutely awful. The graphics are worse than...nothing. I have NEVER seen a game on PS3 look so terrible. I have also encountered dozens of glitches in just 2 hours of play. The load times are ridiculous. The animations play so poorly that it becomes impossible to follow the side stories. I am an avid TLoU and GTA player. I know what my PS3 is capable of. They duped me. Don't let the same thing happen to you. I will be asking for my money back. *I imagine the PS4 version is totally legit.
customer_reviews.author: Bro Montana

customer_reviews.title: This is a game
customer_reviews.text: Great game, great deal.... Although I don't think the ps3 can handle all this game has to offer :/
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Lord of the Rings!
customer_reviews.text: This is an interesting game. I have put several hours in thus far and I have enjoyed it. The only thing that is kind of weird is that you are on your own in enemy territory so you are always fighting your way out of difficult spots. I have not played long enough to really bring some of the features into the game like how you can leave certain characters alive instead of killing them so that you can make them your allies.
customer_reviews.author: Myron TTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Graphics are legit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my twin brother for Christmas. I'm more into sport games & first person shooting games myself so I didn't personally play this one. But I watched my brother & his friends play & OMG the graphics are amazing! The story line is that of a movies. Definitely a great game & you just can't beat amazon's price. The reason I rated it 4 instead of 5 stars is because my brother didn't like that there was more "sneaking around" (his words) than actual fighting; but if these types of games are your style-- you'll love this one! Again, graphics & story line are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: snokeums22

customer_reviews.title: Letters Too Small
customer_reviews.text: If you have an old television that doesn't display words well, this game isn't for you. The letters are small and were blurry on my television. It's important to be able to read the enemies weaknesses and strengths, if you can't, then good luck.
customer_reviews.author: brendan

customer_reviews.title: Good game, bad port.
customer_reviews.text: A bit laggy at times (framerate drops at intense visual moments) , but I was expecting it since I read the reviews. The graphics aren't great either but I don't really mind, considering tha fact that it's actually a ps4 game. The audio mixing is horrible though, the sound effects are way too loud at times even though I lowered the volume in settings, and it also glitches out sometimes. Great game otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: ... that it’s got a ton of extra activities and fun challenges that makes you want to keep going
customer_reviews.text: It’s very addictive in that it’s got a ton of extra activities and fun challenges that makes you want to keep going! The action controls are fairly easy to get the hang of, but are a little sluggish at times. With that being considered, it would be nice to retry or continue on from where the controls didn’t work quite fast enough, rather than all the way back in one of the towers. All in all really enjoyable gameplay!!
customer_reviews.author: KrisM

customer_reviews.title: 2 years of excitement shattered in 10 min
customer_reviews.text: This game is nothing like the ps4 version i seen showcased on every review and sight. I have only been able to play for about 1 hour before the game freezes. I restart and freezes an hour later. I was so pumped about this game for almost 2 years when I herd the whisper of its creation and now I feel like I wasted $60 on something that is far less amazing as it should be. This game is just down right disappointing unless you own a ps4. Feel very let down.
customer_reviews.author: Joe/Jennie Hipple

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: Entertaining game to spend time at home while you're bored.
customer_reviews.author: ORubio

customer_reviews.title: Good for your Lord of the Rings collection
customer_reviews.text: Game is good the majority of the time but there are a few things you need to prepare yourself for if you get this for a PS3... There are glitches, sometimes the speech isn't insinque with the lips, and the game play can get pretty repetitive. Over all its an average Lord of the Rings game with some interesting character flare and play on the storyline of the Lord of the Rings. I would still recommend it for any collector and recommend playing this game at least once.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dibble

customer_reviews.title: the game was great and loved the graphics and the sword fighting was ...
customer_reviews.text: the game was great and loved the graphics and the sword fighting was amazing. the nemesis system when they remembered you after you'd fought them before. great affects to the game. even if your not a fan of lord of the rings this is still a great game to own. excellent for all gamers who like adventure in their games. thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: jrobert

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: Game play is very similar to assassin's creed good storyline good graphics all around good game
customer_reviews.author: andrew wilson

customer_reviews.title: barely OK
customer_reviews.text: poor graphics especially maps legends and spatial orientation, color resolution poor and can hardly adjust image features (despite using a high res plasma screen). needs much work. Difficult to save progress or replay a section.
customer_reviews.author: Tthan

customer_reviews.title: Great game, some lag with lots of characters on the screen, overall good.
customer_reviews.text: The game is fantastic and the story is good. You get some cool powers to use and it has some good surprises. The only complain I have is that when you get a bunch of Orcs on the same screen, it lags a lot. The graphics could be better and smoother, but you should just get it on the PS4 if you own one. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Good in most part but annoying glitches and lag
customer_reviews.text: Could have been absolutely awesome but it lags so much it's nearly unplayable in some parts. The cutscenes are jagged and interrupted by black loading screens. The most annoying part though definitely has to be the audio skipping and going static during the epic battle scenes or when certain alarms are tripped. It really throws you out of the game. I wish I would have waited to get a ps4 and play it on that platform.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ann Brown

customer_reviews.title: Long load times make a fun game,not so fun Ps3 review
customer_reviews.text: Cross between assassin'screed and batman really fun would be 5 stars ,but long load times and a few minor bugs take away from the overall fun. If you don't mind waiting every time you hit pause (seriously everytime )to load a screen,and enjoy beheading orcs this games for you. For Ps3 might be different on other systems
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Shadow of Sauron
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game with highly detailed environment. Lots of Middle Earth lore. The storyline is what was best as it really tied in to the rest of the Middle Earth saga and not just another patch add on but a story with great characters and even some surprises. I just have one negative, the ending was too easy and some of the gameplay was repetitive, but most video games are repetitive. Anyway, hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Great Title to add to your collection!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome game!! Very cool game play, The ability unlocks and skills you learn get better and better! Its Assassin's Creed meet Lord of the Rings!! Only issue is the loading screens, When switching from the pause menu and maps there is a delay that gets really annoying after a while but other than that it is a pretty cool game to add to your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Greg J

customer_reviews.title: I do not play games myself but I know he loved it! Sorry can't tell you much else except ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, I do not play games myself but I know he loved it! Sorry can't tell you much else except when he opened up his gift and saw his face light right up, I knew he would love it!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Parlin

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's time to upgrade, or, it's not a great port, Charlie Brown!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game without reading the reviews for the PS3 version. Apparently, it's not a good port. I couldn't get past the first few training/cut scenes without the game freezing on a loading screen. I left the game on for over an hour to no avail. I've read on a few forums that other PS3 owners are having problems with lagging, graphics, and gameplay. Cynically, maybe this is Sony's way of getting us all to upgrade. Even if that's not the case, I recommend waiting to play this until you have a current gen system.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Stick to Modern Systems
customer_reviews.text: Game locked up a few times on the tutorial and again as I was just about to finish off my first warchief. Stick with the PS4, XBox One, or PC versions as they work the best. It's a very fun game just not worth the hassle on the lower end systems.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Over all its good
customer_reviews.text: The price us a little bet high but its a great deal over all
customer_reviews.author: l3y0nha

customer_reviews.title: It is very annoying. Disclaimer
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this game for PS3. This game was developed for the newer generation consoles and should never have released it on anything but those consoles. Loading screens take forever, even going to and from menu screens has significant lag. Cut scenes where there is dialog is glitchy and sometimes won't play video at all. It is very annoying. Disclaimer: The game itself is an awesome game, don't misunderstand me. I traded it in and bought a PS4 just to play this game. But do NOT buy it for PS3.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bunn

customer_reviews.title: sony messed up this game graphics for us to buy a ps4
customer_reviews.text: Graphics suck , look like a ps2 game, I was very upset when I saw them I still play with my ps3 there's too many games I haven't played but with this crap you seriously rethink it
customer_reviews.author: Lolach444

customer_reviews.title: More like Assasins Creed than Skyrim
customer_reviews.text: If you like Assasins Creed, you will like this. If you are a Skyrim or Mass Effect player, it will not satisfy you. I was really hoping for a game like Skyrim or Fallout, but eventually returned the game to Gamestop. The graphics are really good and the Nemesis engine is interesting...it was just not my type of game.
customer_reviews.author: hopspusher

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Fun gameplay for first hour. Then you realize it is mindless repetition of just fighting the same horde of orcs with little storyline and no stellar upgrades. Wow, didn't care to finish game after the first couple days of play

customer_reviews.text: It is a good game, I would have given it 5 stars if the load times were not so insane. If you don't mind the 30 second loads between screens, its a good game to play. If your impatient, buy the PS4 version.
customer_reviews.author: Davy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Gameplay is great, but this feels like a PS3 port of ...
customer_reviews.text: Gameplay is great, but this feels like a PS3 port of a game meant to be played on a PS4. The sounds often cuts in and out when there is a lot of processing going on, and load screens take FOREVER to load. Even just pausing it to bring up the map or the enemies list takes a long long time, when it should be more or less instant.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Hooper II

customer_reviews.title: Get the Patch!
customer_reviews.text: The recent patches have lessened the issues any of the Nov 2014 reviews address. It's never going to match the PS4 version, but post-patch it is a fun game worth a look.

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good. The gameplay really isn't streamlined
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good. The gameplay really isn't streamlined. A lot of stuff you have to read which isn't that great. Could be a better storyline and game flow but the action is good. The difficulty is pretty good.

customer_reviews.text: Great Game. Get it while you can still get games for the PS3.

customer_reviews.text: On the PS3 this game freezes and lags way too much. If it was not for the great plot, cinematic, and game play I would have rated lower. The cut scenes are sometimes hardly audible and in key scenes the system will just freeze

customer_reviews.title: This game is amazing. I noticed some little lag spots and sound ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing. I noticed some little lag spots and sound skip. Nothing major, just means my PS3 is being tested to the max. It's a really fun game to play. Looks amazing as well.

customer_reviews.title: Shadow of Mordor is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! If you like the LOTR and Hobbit movies/books youll love it. Excellent graphics, cool sword fighting combos and all. What are you waiting for, get this game and go hunt some orcs!

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully, with the patch
customer_reviews.text: I had seen lots of talk of huge graphic issues, as well as rumors of a patch that pretty much fixed everything. I had not seen many reviews confirming this, but I gave it a try. The loading screens are a tad long, and there were minor issues with the cutscenes, but other than that I can confirm that it is working wonderfully. Graphics are great overall, functioning exactly as I hoped, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: b. whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Total Orc killer lol
customer_reviews.text: Really intense game and worth the money you spend get ready for total sword play killing the orces so so radical better then i ever thought.

customer_reviews.title: Get it for PS4 or Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: The game was constantly loading textures and sounds. Very laggy. It was too distracting. The game seemed very fun, but I couldn't get through it. I would not recommend getting this for PS3 or 360
customer_reviews.author: Tihara Ezzo

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy...seriously.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it is on the x360 or the latest gen consoles, but never had I played a game that had horrible graphics, speech skips, music skips, horrible lag, and other maddening issues. This is the worse game I have played on the PS3. I do admit that it is my mistake of buying this game (even though it was on sale), I warn others to not buy this game. Unless you are looking for something to rage about then go ahead.

customer_reviews.title: Its alright but theres something off
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure why I don't love this game. I should, because it's made really well and is set in my favorite fantasy world ever, but nothing drew me into the game

customer_reviews.title: Would be a great game otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Game needs an update. Severe lag in game play. I quit playing. Would be a great game otherwise.

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and my boyfriend loved it. :) Can't say much about the game itself because I don't play it. But he can sit and play for hours so I assume it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend for PS3
customer_reviews.text: Had some fun playing the game itself, but it is very buggy. The game once froze during an auto-save and I lost all of my game progress and had to start over. I would recommend backing up your save game files on a USB or other external device if you do play this on the PS3. I'm on the final (or one of the final) missions now and it has frozen each of the three times I've tried to play it. The load times in and out of the menu are also way too long.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward review
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game, really cool aspects such as when an enemy kills you he gets stronger and remembers you. Only four stars as the ending was very anti climactic. Still...fun game!

customer_reviews.title: Probably a lot better for the ps4
customer_reviews.text: The scenery was difficult to distinguish from itself, hard to see where you were going and lacked direction of being told where to go. Glitchy at times as well, found myself stuck in a mountain wall not able to move several times. Probably a lot better for the ps4.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin DeGarmo

customer_reviews.title: It has good review and for $20 you couldn't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: haven't had time to play it yet. It has good review and for $20 you couldn't go wrong

customer_reviews.title: Game froze out on me about 2 hours in. ...
customer_reviews.text: Game froze out on me about 2 hours in. All the memory for it in those 2 hours was gone upon restart of the system. If I wanted to keep playing this game I would had to start from scratch. No thank you, this game is a piece of you know what.

And this problem not only happens with my device... i see that many guys have the same problem with his ps3 consoles

customer_reviews.title: Great game overall, actually fun assassin's creed

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy Port - Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Buggy. Frequent crashes on missions. Love the gameplay itself but this shoddy port is inexusable. Clipping audio ending in crashes during MAIN CAMPAIGN missions. DLC missions crashing 100% of the time. Long load times every time you dare open the map/menu; which also has a low chance of causing a crash all by itself (the game really does not like the "Sauron's Army" roster screen). And to rub salt into the wound, 20 or 30 seconds of unskippable corporate BS and logos (in TWO languages) between starting the game and actually reaching the main game menu. Being greeted with that after multiple crashes is... special.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: but the textures are poor, bad Framerate
customer_reviews.text: Its playable, but the textures are poor, bad Framerate, alot popping, and alot loading times, very bad port for PS3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great game, very smooth controls, basically a better version of Assassin's creed. The PS3 version is a bit laggy, so don't be suprised, it only really effects the menu's though, in game works just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy transaction, exactly as explained, product in excellent condition.

customer_reviews.title: I think I hit a frame rate of 2. Not even an exaggeration.
customer_reviews.text: This game is nearly unplayable due to the performance. It doesn't run any sort of smoothly and the frame rate reduces cutscenes to pictures. I've heard it is much better on other consoles, but the ps3 version is just garbage.

customer_reviews.title: l like exploring the whole map at my leisure
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this game. l like exploring the whole map at my leisure.

customer_reviews.title: Why is it not standard for all games to let you invert controls?
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is fun and the way the lore is presented is reminiscent of the books (by this i mean everything is either thrown at you quickly or your left wandering alone) and i was intrigued by the gameplay. My biggest complaint is that you can't invert the left/right camera movements. I hate it when games do this because it rarely gets mentioned in reviews and its game breaking for me. If i'd known i would have bought a pc copy instead and played with a mouse and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: If you have gotten tired of all of your other favorite games, this one could be fun. I've played it a few times but I'm probably not going to anymore. I would say just rent it, go to town one night, and return it.

customer_reviews.title: It was fun when it worked
customer_reviews.text: The game didn't work sadly. I got to play for an hour, then the video got messed up and then the sound went screwy. It was fun when it worked, but I ended up returning it. Don't do it dudes.

customer_reviews.title: alright, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This game is fine, it works and even though people may argue the graphics are also fine and the graphical glitches arent that bad as long as youre expecting them. If you need this game but dont have access to the next gen consoles, it'll work fine for you. However if you do have a PS4, or will be getting one soon, i'd say play it on that for the best experience

customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this game on PS3. Horrible port back to the previous generation of console. Game is super fun if you look past the unloaded textures, 10 fps, and an environment that looks like it was made for ps2.

customer_reviews.title: will you stop the ever growing darkness of morrdor and reap your revenge?

customer_reviews.title: The fighting is like Batman Arkham
customer_reviews.text: The highlight of this game is that your battles affect the game. I do not want to spoil it for you, but if you lose to a monster, that monster may become stronger and next time you face it, may trash talk. Do you really want to miss that? The fighting is like Batman Arkham, except that it is more forgiving, thus it great and just natural and it is a great feeling to feel all powerful with the powers given to you.

customer_reviews.text: I just love this game. Hands down. Definitely worth the time and the money, I genuinely hope there will be a sequel.

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, but...
customer_reviews.text: This game is a mixed, Here's why. Pros- Gameplay- gameplay is perfect, no complaints. Blends the games Batman, Assassins creed,etc. Story- I also loved the story, but, the protaganist isnt the best character, but he is not the worst. Cons- The Ps3/Xbox version of this game is filled with glitches, low framerate, and this often got in the way that i didnt want to play it anymore. Graphics- arent as bad as everyone says, but they are not good. Overall, if your only option is last gen, and you are determined to get it, then get it, just be prepared for some of the problems.

customer_reviews.text: It is a great game don't get me wrong but it should have never been released on the ps3 if it didn't run smoothly or at least simi smooth.

customer_reviews.title: I thought that it was a good game overall
customer_reviews.text: I thought that it was a good game overall, however, the story seemed very short for how big the game could have been.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Shameful release! Tolkien would be horrified!
customer_reviews.text: What a sad failure! Poor graphics with glitches and skips. Long load time between scenes. Loud dramatic soundtrack that does not match the action and plays constantly, even during non-dramatic moments, and drowns out dialog so you can't hear it. I predict you will be finding a lot of copies of this game soon in the $3 box at your local gaming store!
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Alright game. I think is kinda hard right at the behinning and it hasnt been able to keep my.full attention yet but i am a girl so that could just be me. I love the LOTR trilogy and the Hobbit trilogy so i love the idea of this game but i wish it were a little more explained to me. Thanks ;)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Solid game
customer_reviews.text: I just want to start off by saying THIS IS NOT A NEXT GEN GAME SO DONT EXPECT IT TO BE!!!! The combat is amazing it makes you just want to forget about the story and just find orcs to fight!! The graphics are the reason for the 4 stars because there not great but there really no as bad as people are making them sound. there was an update out out and it fixed a lot of issues people were having. I would defiantly recommend this game
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It's barely better than ps2 graphics
customer_reviews.text: unplayable, literally, it has nothing to do with the gameplay, the game just keeps crashing with lots of graphic bugs. It's barely better than ps2 graphics. There are constantly weird audio bugs that causes the same audio track to repeat, which is really annoying. Game has froze on my ps3 at least 3 times within 2 hours of gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: Mayu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game and the price was just right.
customer_reviews.author: anita martinez

customer_reviews.title: All of the bad things people say about the PS3 version of this ...
customer_reviews.text: All of the bad things people say about the PS3 version of this game are true: the gameplay and audio lag constantly, it takes 10+ seconds to open the pause menu, textures show up well after you've arrived in an area (or not at all), etc. All of the words people use to describe the folks who let this travesty make it to market are also accurate: shockingly unprofessional, utterly embarrassing, and so on. It's a real shame, because you can tell that the game should be great (and IS on the next-gen systems). The optimists say that things will smooth out with some patches, but I'm not holding my breath.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Fun game but very buggy on PS3
customer_reviews.text: I had this game pre-ordered. I wish I had waited and read the other reviews. Cut scenes don't work half the time. The game occasionally freezes when you get into a big battle with many enemies, or when you are at the Sauron's Army screen. I hope they patch this soon. It is a pretty fun game. With these frustrations though, I wish I had spent my 60 dollars elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ps3 Version Lacks
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on getting the game anytime soon I recommend waiting or purchasing the game for ps4. Shadows of Mordor on the ps3 is terrible, the core mechanics of the game do not run as smoothly as Batman and/or assassins creed games. Also, the nemesis system for the ps3 version is a shadow compared to the ps4 version. Here is a link to a blog about the matter -->

product_meta.title: Middle Earth: Shadow of Mordor - PlayStation 3
product_meta.description: You are Talion, a Ranger of the Black Gate, keeping watch over Mordor which has remained undisturbed for ages. In the blink of an eye, everything is taken from you - your friends, your family, and even your own life. Resurrected by a vengeful spirit, you must now embark on a relentless vendetta against those who have wronged you. Fight through Mordor and uncover the truth of the spirit that compels you, discover the origins of the Rings of Power, build your legend and ultimately confront the evil of Sauron in this new chronicle in Middle-earth. Harness the Spirit of vengeance to inflict brutal combos while mastering powerful new skills and weaponry. Exploit the individual fears, weakness and memories of your enemies as you dismantle Sauron's forces from within. Become the most feared force in Mordor in a new chronicle set before the events of the Lord of the Rings.
feature_bullets: Harness the Spirit of vengeance to inflict brutal combos while mastering powerful new skills and weaponry.
Exploit the individual fears, weakness and memories of your enemies as you dismantle Sauron's forces from within.
Become the most feared force in Mordor in a new chronicle set before the events of the Lord of the Rings.
